inbox.description: Mailboxes, grouped — with instant email preview

adminTelegram.description: Manage the site-owned bot and webhooks

hero.title: Temporary inboxes, forwarding, and automation — in one platform.
hero.description: Build an inbound email pipeline you can trust. Create multi-domain inboxes, ingest mail via Webhook or IMAP, forward to SMTP/Webhook targets, and run workflows on every message.

operational.label: Operational
operational.text: logs for inbound events and automation.

flexible.label: Flexible
flexible.text: inbound sources: Webhook or IMAP worker.

fast.label: Fast
fast.text: Docker Compose setup with SQLite persistence.

preview.remoteImagesBlocked: Remote images are blocked by default.
preview.lightweight: A lightweight preview of the real app UI.

featuresSection.title: Everything you need for inbound email.
featuresSection.description: From disposable inboxes to production pipelines — TEmail keeps it simple.

multiDomain.title: Multi-domain inboxes
multiDomain.description: Create inboxes across domains — organize with groups, tags, and search.

ingestion.title: Webhook & IMAP ingestion
ingestion.description: Receive inbound mail via Webhook, or sync from IMAP with the worker service.

forwarding.title: Powerful forwarding
forwarding.description: Forward via SMTP/Webhook with templates and safe defaults for production.

automation.title: Workflow automation
automation.description: Trigger workflows on inbound messages to parse, notify, enrich, or route.

observability.title: Observable by design
observability.description: Audit inbound events and rule execution with logs you can actually use.

privacyDefaults.title: Privacy-first defaults
privacyDefaults.description: Keep sensitive content private — remote images are blocked by default.

howSection.title: How it works
howSection.description: Get value quickly, then scale up as your inbound traffic grows.

connect.title: Connect inbound
connect.description: Add a domain and choose Webhook or IMAP as the source.

inboxes.title: Create inboxes
inboxes.description: Spin up mailboxes for signups, integrations, or catch-alls.

route.title: Route & automate
route.description: Forward messages and trigger workflows to process everything.

faqSection.title: FAQ
faqSection.description: Quick answers to common questions about deployment and privacy.

selfHosted.a: Yes. TEmail is designed to run on your own infrastructure. Docker Compose is the recommended way to deploy.

imap.a: IMAP syncing runs in a separate worker process that periodically pulls mailboxes and writes them into TEmail.

registration.a: Yes. The server supports closed or invite-only registration modes, so you can control access.

tracking.a: Remote images are blocked by default in the email preview to reduce tracking and protect privacy.

bottomCta.title: Ready to own your inbound email?
bottomCta.description: Deploy TEmail and start routing messages in minutes — without giving up privacy or control.
